objects.name: GameOver
objects.string:
Juego Terminado

Presiona cualquier boton para comenzar de nuevo

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian, Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave, or an ellipsis.


Example uses:
- Floating objects, such as powerups or coins
- Moveable platforms
- Enemy movement patterns

Properties:
- Horizontal distance
- Vertical distance
- Horizontal speed
- Vertical speed
- Center of movement, X position
- Center of movement, Y position

Tips:
- For circular or elliptical movement, the horizontal and vertical speed need to be the same
- For horizontal movement only, set vertical distance to 0
- For vertical movement only, set horizontal distance to 0
- For figure-8 movement, set horizontal speed to 1/2 of the vertical speed
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SineMovement
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave, or an ellipsis.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave.

Example uses:
- Floating pickups
- Moveable platforms
- Enemy movement

Properties:
- Center of movement, X position
- Center of movement, Y position
- Horizontal distance
- Vertical distance
- Horizontal speed
- Horizontal distance

Tips:
- For circular or elliptical movement, the horizontal and vertical speed need to be the same
- For horizontal movement, set vertical distance to 0
- For vertical movement, set horizontal distance to 0
- For figure-8 movement, set horizontal speed to 1/2 of the vertical speed.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SineMovement

events.comment: Set the center of movement to the initial location of the object

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Lim98SE
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
This extension provide two behaviors:

- Turn object into cursor
Make the object as the new cursor

- Clickable button 
Provide a new condition on the object for fast checking is this one has been clicked.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: MouseHelper
eventsFunctionsExtensions.previewIconUrl: https://resources.gdevelop-app.com/assets/Icons/Line Hero Pack/Master/SVG/Computers and Hardware/Computers and Hardware_mouse_wireless.svg
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Check if a sprite has been clicked and turn any objects into a cursor.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: An easy way to turn any object into a mouse cursor.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: cursor

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Turns any object into a button, useful to know if it has been clicked with a simple object condition.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: button

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: isClicked
